hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
sudo yum install -y git which java-1.8.0-openjdk-devel.s390x gcc-c++ make automake autoconf libtool libstdc++-static tar wget patch words libXt-devel libX11-devel unset JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS export LANG="en_US.UTF-8" export JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS="-Dfile.encoding=UTF8" export ANT_OPTS="-Xms4G -Xmx4G"
cd $HOME wget http://archive.apache.org/dist/ant/binaries/apache-ant-1.9.2-bin.tar.gz tar -xvf apache-ant-1.9.2-bin.tar.gz cd apache-ant-1.9.2 export ANT_HOME=`pwd` cd bin export PATH=$PATH:`pwd`
cd $HOME git clone https://github.com/xerial/snappy-java.git cd snappy-java git checkout develop export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk make IBM_JDK_7=1 USE_GIT=1 GIT_SNAPPY_BRANCH=master GIT_REPO_URL=https://github.com/google/snappy.git
cd $HOME git clone https://github.com/apache/cassandra.git cd cassandra git checkout cassandra-3.0
rm $HOME/cassandra/lib/snappy-java-1.1.1.7.jar cp $HOME/snappy-java/target/snappy-java-1.1.3-SNAPSHOT.jar $HOME/cassandra/lib/snappy-java-1.1.3.jar
cd $HOME git clone https://github.com/java-native-access/jna.git cd jna ant cp $HOME/jna/build/jna.jar $HOME/cassandra/lib/jna.jar rm $HOME/cassandra/lib/jna-4.0.0.jar
cd $HOME/cassandra sed 's/240000/24000000/' build.xml sed 's/600000/60000000/' build.xml
echo "key_cache_size_in_mb: 16" >> ./test/conf/cassandra.yaml ant
